@martinwicke @philwo recently added the LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the list of environment passed when using the default shell env (which the action might not, this is an option in genrule / skylark action). This should be fixed with Bazel at HEAD.

Also we have a more general principle approach to that, see http://www.bazel.io/docs/designs/2016/06/21/environment.html

So this is a problem in Bazel, and we fixed it but there might be some fix to do when invoking protoc
